attributes.action: UK and UN to recognize Tibet as a nation (including historic land/boarders.)
attributes.additional_details: 'Right Wing Libertarians - RWL' (www.facebook.com/rightwinglibertarians) (like the page) ,is a UK based political organisation that are helping Tibet become a nation, to do this countries in the UN must recognize it as a nation. The oppressive Chinese communist regime has killed over a million people (1/5 of Tibet's population) and now Tibet's are a minority on their own land, and daily run the risk of being tortured. We want their historic land returned, not just the autonomous region.
attributes.background: Tortured by the Chinese government - "WHEN THEY GAVE ME ELECTRIC SHOCKS, I COULD FEEL NOTHING. ONLY SMELT THE BURNING OF MY OWN FLESH" - Golog Jigme, former political prisoner. In 1950 the Chinese Communist government invaded Tibet, wrongly claiming Tibet's land as their own, killing 1.2M tibetians.

rejection.details: The UK Government could take this action, but it could not compel the UN as a whole to do so. It could, however, urge the UN to do this.
